name: places/ChIJjS3jkRz2wokR5nTUw6rz7Gg
formattedAddress: 35 E 106th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 35 E 106th St, New York, NY 10029-4421, USA

originalText.text:
I am delighted to share my wonderful experience with my dentist! From the moment I stepped into your office, I was warmly greeted by your friendly staff, setting the tone for a positive visit. Your expertise and professionalism are truly commendable. You patiently listened to my concerns and provided clear explanations about the treatments and procedures. I felt comfortable and confident under your care.
I must mention the exceptional level of care and attention I received during my recent dental procedure. Not only did you execute it with precision, but your gentle approach made the entire process much smoother.

originalText.text: It is such a pleasure coming to the dentist. Not everyone is a fan of the dentist office but I can assure you I am at peace whenever I need to get my cleaning. Front desk Jessie does a great job to ensure your appts are scheduled and is always greeting the patients with kindness. I will be returning.

text.text: It is such a pleasure coming to the dentist. Not everyone is a fan of the dentist office but I can assure you I am at peace whenever I need to get my cleaning. Front desk Jessie does a great job to ensure your appts are scheduled and is always greeting the patients with kindness. I will be returning.

originalText.text: Got a cavity filled. She did a terrible job, filled it 2 times in one sitting because she did such a bad job the first time and she ruined my tooth. Now i need a 3000$ root canal. AVOID THIS DENTIST AT ALL COSTS. Ive had 10 cavities filled and NEVER had any issues like i am having now. Terrible dentist, wonder how many other people teeth she has ruined.

AVOID THIS DENTIST AT ALL COSTS. Ive had 10 cavities filled and NEVER had any issues like i am having now. Terrible dentist, wonder how many other people teeth she has ruined.

originalText.text: I've been coming to this dentist office since it was Dr. Treger, and it is such a great place. Often I've had insurance that covers my dental visits elsewhere, but I am loyal to Dr. Shahinyan and her staff. For instance I have a (probably irrational) fear of root canals, and have never needed one.  On two occasions, knowing my fear, she successfully did fillings on the affected teeth that did the trick. I don't mind paying out of pocket because you can't put a price on good dental care that you can consistently trust. Thank you!

originalText.text: Amazing dentist. Amazing dental technicians and assistants. I’m happy I found this office. I highly recommend them.
